FALCON: Lightweight and Accurate Convolution

File: models/falcon.py - Contain source code for decomposing standard convolution kernel to FALCON kernels.

Version: 1.0

class models.falcon.GEPdecompose(conv_layer, rank=1, init=True, alpha=1.0, bn=False, relu=False, groups=1)ÔÉÅ

GEP decomposition class

decompose(conv, point_wise, depth_wise, learning_rate=0.001, steps=600)ÔÉÅ

GEP decomposes standard convolution kernel

Parameters:

  • conv ‚Äì standard convolution kernel

  • point_wise ‚Äì decomposed pointwise convolution kernel

  • depth_wise ‚Äì decomposed depthwise convolution kernel

  • learning_rate ‚Äì learning rate

  • steps ‚Äì training steps for decomposing

decompose_rank(kernel, learning_rate=0.005, steps=600)ÔÉÅ

GEP decomposes standard convolution kernel with different rank

Parameters:

  • conv ‚Äì standard convolution kernel

  • learning_rate ‚Äì learning rate

  • steps ‚Äì training steps for decomposing

forward(input_)ÔÉÅ

Run forward propagation

Parameters:

input ‚Äì input feature maps

Returns:

out: output tensor of forward propagation

group1x1(group_num)ÔÉÅ

Replace 1x1 pointwise convolution in FALCON with 1x1 group convolution

Parameters:

group_num ‚Äì number of groups for 1x1 group

class models.resnet.ResNet(layer_num='18', num_classes=10, alpha=1.0)ÔÉÅ

ResNet model

falcon(rank, init=False, groups=1, alpha=1.0)ÔÉÅ

Replace standard convolution by FALCON

Parameters:

  • rank ‚Äì rank of GEP

  • init ‚Äì whether initialize FALCON with GEP decomposition tensors

  • groups ‚Äì number of groups for pointwise convolution

forward(input_)ÔÉÅ

Run forward propagation

Parameters:

input ‚Äì input feature maps

Returns:

(out, out_conv): output features after the fully connected layer, and output features of residual layers

FALCON: Lightweight and Accurate Convolution

File: models/stconv_branch.py

  • Contain model with stconv_branch and falcon compressed model.

Version: 1.0

class models.stconv_branch.BasicBlock(in_channels, out_channels, stride=1)ÔÉÅ

Description: BasicBlock of ResNet with StConv_branch

forward(input_)ÔÉÅ

Run forward propagation

Parameters:

input ‚Äì input features

Returns:

out_: output features

class models.stconv_branch.ResNetStConvBranch(layer_num='18', num_classes=10, alpha=1)ÔÉÅ

Description: ResNet Model with StConv_branch

falcon(rank, init=True, alpha=1.0, batch_norm=False, relu=False, groups=1)ÔÉÅ

Replace standard convolution by FALCON

Parameters:

  • rank ‚Äì rank of GEP

  • init ‚Äì whether initialize FALCON with GEP decomposition tensors

  • batch_norm ‚Äì whether add batch normalization after FALCON

  • relu ‚Äì whether add ReLU function after FALCON

  • groups ‚Äì number of groups for pointwise convolution

forward(input_)ÔÉÅ

Run forward propagation

Parameters:

input ‚Äì input features

Returns:

(out, out_conv): output features, and output features before the fully connected layer

class models.stconv_branch.ResidualLayer(in_channels, out_channels, layer_num='34', stride=1)ÔÉÅ

Description: add shortcut to BasicBlock

forward(input_)ÔÉÅ

Run forward propagation

Parameters:

input ‚Äì input features

Returns:

self.relu(stacked_out): output features of residual layer

class models.stconv_branch.StConvBranch(inp, oup, stride=1)ÔÉÅ

Description: Basic unit of ShuffleUnit with standard convolution

falcon(rank=1, init=True, alpha=1.0, batch_norm=False, relu=False, groups=1)ÔÉÅ

Replace standard convolution by FALCON

Parameters:

  • rank ‚Äì rank of GEP

  • init ‚Äì whether initialize FALCON with GEP decomposition tensors

  • alpha ‚Äì width multiplier

  • batch_norm ‚Äì whether add batch normalization after FALCON

  • relu ‚Äì whether add ReLU function after FALCON

  • groups ‚Äì number of groups for pointwise convolution

forward(input_)ÔÉÅ

Run forward propagation

Parameters:

x ‚Äì input feature maps

Returns:

channel_shuffle(out, 2): channel shuffled output feature maps

Description: VGG class.

Replace standard convolution by FALCON

Parameters:

  • rank ‚Äì rank of GEP

  • init ‚Äì whether initialize FALCON with GEP decomposition tensors

  • batch_norm ‚Äì whether add batch normalization after FALCON

  • relu ‚Äì whether add ReLU function after FALCON

  • groups ‚Äì number of groups for pointwise convolution
